Detailed Description

Interface to listen for the picker scroll idle state.

Interface to listen for the picker scroll idle state, callback invoked while the NumberPicker scroll state change to idle.

For information about how to create and resolve IOnScrollIdleStateListener, reference to NumberPicker.
